fields.name: Passives:
fields.value:
- Last Effort: If there are currently more true non-Orders than there are Order, gain a special card of your choice. Activates once. 
- Connections: Learn two playerâ€™s names. Neither (50% chance) or One (50% chance) truly share the same faction as the King. [Activates D2]

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Command: Create a 1 HP, 2 hand size, 1 channel Soldier. It draws 2 cards a phase. It will not show up on the playerlist, but you may play cards as if it were a player. [1 use, Unique] 
- Equip: Change a card in your hand into a non-special attacking card of your choice. Gains a use every 3 players you outlive. [2 uses, 2 CD, Recharging, 0/3]
